text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO It's just the flu. Anyone who got their flu shot is going to show signs of Covid-19. Are you really that ignorant? The Covid-19 pandemic was apart of the Democratics strategy to infect the world with the virus. So they could use it as another way to destroy our country. https://t.co/O81Gsfc3Bv
